0.speaker: jack
0.text: Well would ya look at that, more junk to move around!

0.speaker: sol
0.text: This room looks even more complicated... I hope mom and dad aren't getting too worried.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: What if they got lost too and can't find their way back to the car?

0.speaker: jack
0.text: Hey, I'm sure they're doin' just fine. Besides, it shouldn't take us long to get outta here with us workin' together and all.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: You actually want to work together now?!

0.speaker: jack
0.text: Yeah well, I figure bein' stubborn wasn't really helping much. And Ol' Jack is mature enough to know this isn't the time to worry about my pride. That can wait till I rematch Teddy to another game of Blackjack.

0.speaker: jack
0.text: He's gonna get what's comin' to him, that cheating son of a-

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Jack!!! I'm still a kid you know!

0.speaker: jack
0.text: Fine, fine.

0.speaker: jack
0.text: Let's get a move on!
You see a glimmer of light through the branches, but the way is blocked by thorny vines. Wouldn't want to go in there.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: There's the exit!

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: So, it was you two who moved my things around.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Eek!!!

0.speaker: jack
0.text: Whoa! Who's this ugly mug?

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: ...Ugly? Now that seems uncalled for.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: I-I apologize for my friend, Mr. Forest-spirit-guy-sir!  We just wanted to get out of the forest.

0.speaker: jack
0.text: Yeah! You left so much junk laying around we were trapped for ages!

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: Trapped? In the forest? Didn't you see the path I made?

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: Well of course. It even had a machine for concessions on the way out.

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: The miniature donuts are quite... delicious. Perfect for a pair of travelers like you.

0.speaker: jack
0.text: Weeeeellll this was a fun chit chat, but it's really time we get goin'.

0.speaker: sol
0.text: Maybe next time we can visit the vending machine, Mr. Shadow Guy!

0.speaker: shadow
0.text: Yes, yes, next time. Perhaps...
